questions.text: Gephi allows the user to configure the following parameters:

“Nidhi Razdan received an offer to teach journalism at Harvard University. After a few months, she realized that it was not genuine and meant to access her personal information”. 
 Which of the following statements is/are true? 
 i. It is a phishing attack. 
 ii. It is a semantic attack.
What are the potential reasons users change their usernames?
What is correct, when talking about the username change frequency?
options: It is strongly and positively correlated to the indegree of the users
It is weakly and positively correlated to the indegree of the users
It is strongly and negatively correlated to the indegree of the users
It is weakly and negatively correlated to the indegree of the users
questions.correctAnswer: It is weakly and positively correlated to the indegree of the users

questions.text:
True or False 
 “ Link farming will not be effective in increasing your social capital and influence.”
Which of the following option(s) is/are the correct syntax for reading a .csv file in python?
options:
import pandas as pd 
 data=pd.read_csv("filename.csv",header = None, encoding='utf-8')

import pandas as pd 
 f ile="filename.csv" 
 data=pd.read_csv(file,header = None, encoding='utf-8')

import pandas as pd 
 data=pd.read_csv(filename.csv, header = None, encoding='utf-8')
questions.correctAnswer:
import pandas as pd 
 data=pd.read_csv("filename.csv",header = None, encoding='utf-8')
